title: Lobby icon bug
body: I'm not sure if they fixed this yet but evety time I go into a lobby all I see is the default minion sum icon. The last time I was on was 2 days ago so I'm not exactly sure but if anyone is or was getting the same thing as me then if you want let me know :) ...

replies.body: I have had the problem too, but only in the normal blind pick lobby, in ranked and normal draft pick i have no had that problem at all
I haven't seen it today, but please let me know if you still see it.
